title: The Top 3 Robotics Stocks to Buy in April 2024
text: The U.S. economy holds promise with the rapid growth of robotics stocks and automation across industries. Companies increasingly invest in automated systems, expecting significant improvements in output quality, efficiency and uptime.

title: Google's controversial move to kill the web cookie just got delayed until 2025
text: Google delayed the removal of third-party cookies from Chrome again. The move gives companies more time to prepare for the removal of cookies, following pushback.

title: Alphabet earnings should show AI boosts, but Google still faces many clouds
text: Contrasting opinions highlight a divergent storyline as Alphabet Inc. nears its first-quarter earnings report on Thursday.

title: Google Cookie Phase Out Postponed Yet Again
text: Google has once again delayed plans to eliminate third-party cookies on its Chrome browser. The tech giant made that announcement Tuesday (April 23) evening, soon after a British regulator expressed concerns about Google's proposed alternative to using cookies, known as the Privacy Sandbox.

title: Google Cookie Phase Out Postponed Yet Again
text: Google has once again delayed plans to eliminate third-party cookies on its Chrome browser. The tech giant made that announcement Tuesday (April 23) evening, soon after a British regulator expressed concerns about Google's proposed alternative to using cookies, known as the Privacy Sandbox.

title: Exclusive: Google rival Tuta complains to EU tech regulators about de-ranking
text: German email service Tuta Mail has complained to European Union tech regulators about what it described as a sudden drop in Google search results on the day the bloc's new tech rules kicked in.

title: 3 Stocks to Scoop Up at a Discount While the AI Rally Takes a Breather
text: Interest in generative artificial intelligence (AI) has surged, aligning with broader interest around companies operating in this space. Internet searches, news coverage and discussions on earnings calls all showcase the sort of hype and hysteria following companies in this space.

title: Cash Flow Kings: 3 Stocks Sitting on Mountains of Money
text: Cash flow is a key metric for evaluating a stock, especially for long-term value investors interested in cash flow stocks. In fact, it is one of the core sources of funds for a well-run company to pay dividends.

title: Alphabet Earnings Preview: Why GOOG Stock Could Soar After Its Q1 Report
text: One of the most dominant tech companies with an enormous scope of the internet search market, Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG ) stock continues to be a home-run holding for so many long-term investors. GOOG stock, like other tech giants, has surged to new highs.

title: Invest Like a Billionaire: Consider These 4 Tech Stocks
text: Billionaires are investing heavily in technology, an area that has led gains in the S&P 500 in recent months. A few stocks in particular show up over and over in 16 hedge funds analyzed by The Motley Fool.

title: Here's how to play Google going into Q1 earnings
text: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) shares are trading near all-time highs going into Q1 earnings. The company has a history of reporting EPS numbers that beat the consensus estimates quarter after quarter and quarter might not be that different.

title: This AI Stock Trades at a Dirt-Cheap Valuation, and Its Chatbot Just Hit 200 Million Users
text: Many artificial intelligence stocks are trading at high multiples, even with the market's recent pullback. Chinese-based Baidu could offer investors a cheaper alternative.
